TenantSecurityMonitorMetric.name: TenantSecurityMonitorMetric
TenantSecurityMonitorMetric.description: Stores the daily count and daily count change for a metric within Security Center. This object is available to Security Center subscribers in API version 53.0 and later.

ChangeCount.description: How much the relevant metric changed.

EndProcessTime.description: The date and time that the metric count process ended.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric counted. This field is unique within your organization.

PreviousMetricIdentifier.description: The previous ID of the type of metric that was counted. This field is unique within your organization.

StartProcessTime.description: The date and time that the metric count process started.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant that was scored.
